page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: I AM JAMES BEADLE AGED 11 YEARS AND I HAVE LIVED AT SOUTH VIEW FARM, BINSOE, A LITTLE HAMLET NEAR WEST TANFIELD ALL MY LIFE.MY DAD TERRY IS A TENNANT FARMER ON THE BOURNE_ARTON ESTATE.OUR FARM IS 50 ACRES. AS WE ARE A SMALL FARM, ALL THE FAMILY HAVE TO LEND A HAND.WHEN IT IS MILKING TIME I GO ON THE TRACTOR AND "FAN"OUR DOG COMES WITH ME.WE GO DOWN THE FIELDS TO WHERE THE FREISIAN COWS ARE.I TELL FAN TO "COME BY",AND SHE ROUNDS THE COWS UP.I TELL HER TO "TOUCH THEM"AND SHE NIPS THE BACKS OF THE COWS'LEGS AND THEY WALK TOWARDS THE GATE.WE DRIVE THEM UP TO THE COLLECTING YARD. MEANWHILE MOTHER IS PREPARING THE MILK UNITS AND MY SISTER HELEN IS FILLING BUCKETS WITH ROLLED BARLEY,FOR THE COWS.OUR COWS ARE MILKED TWICE A DAY.
